Text: Bless the LORD, O my soul. O LORD my God, You are very great; You are clothed with splendor and majesty.
Context: The psalmist expresses admiration and reverence to God’s greatness and majestic nature.

Text: He wraps Himself in light as with a garment; He stretches out the heavens like a tent.
Context: The imagery of God‘s creative power and glory is highlighted by depicting Him as clothed with light and as the one who stretches out the heavens.

Text: He lays the beams of His chambers on the waters; He makes the clouds His chariot; He walks on the wings of the wind.
Context: The verse speaks to the sovereignty of God over creation, describing Him in majestic and almost fantastical images.

Text: He makes the winds His messengers, flames of fire His servants.
Context: God’s command over the natural elements is shown, expressing his sovereignty and power.

Text: He set the earth on its foundations, never to be moved.
Context: A statement about God‘s act of creation, giving the earth stability and permanence.

Text: You covered it with the deep as with a garment; the waters stood above the mountains.
Context: The verse reflects on the time of creation when the earth was covered by primordial waters.

Text: At Your rebuke the waters fled; at the sound of Your thunder, they hurried away.
Context: The power of God’s command is illustrated as the waters retreat in response to His rebuke, implying God‘s control over even the most chaotic elements.

Text: The mountains rose, the valleys sank down to the place You assigned for them.
Context: The process of God’s creation is described, showing His purpose and intention in forming the earth‘s topography.

Text: You set a boundary they cannot cross; never again will they cover the earth.
Context: The permanent boundaries set by God for the waters, ensuring they will not return to cover the earth.

Text: He sends forth springs in the valleys; they flow between the mountains.
Context: God’s provision for the earth, giving water for sustenance and life, is narrated with an appreciation for His care.
